name: NYCSubwayTimes
0:
”Alexa open the n y c subway times skill”
”Alexa ask n y c station times when is the next uptown 6 train coming at the 14th street station”
”Alexa ask n y c station times when is the next downtown 7 train coming at the queensboro plaza station”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. y. c. subway times
des:
Track upcoming New York City subway times using this Alexa skill that pulls from real-time MTA GTFS data. Simply ask Alexa when the next train is coming at a given station. This skill also offers a screen for Echo Show's that displays up to the next 5 trains at your requested stop. No login required, and no personal information is stored or requested.

All data is pulled from MTA real time servers, but can be pulled from the server's cache if the data is less than 30 seconds old.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
